definition: a room (as in a hotel or airport) with seating where people can wait, sit or recline comfortably
details:
noun
- a room (as in a hotel or airport) with seating where people can wait
= synonyms: waiting room, waiting area
- an upholstered seat for more than one person
= synonyms: couch
verb
- sit or recline comfortably
- be about
= synonyms: tarry
